movies.title: The Fun Park
movies.plot: Late one night in 1980, evidence exists that "Bobo - The Insult Clown" was bludgeoned to death while locking up for the night at the "Family Fun Park." For the next twenty-six years, the tale of Bobo's ghost swells into an urban legend, as his remains were never found. Now it's 2006 and six teens on a mission to refute "the Fun Park" myth, make a deadly discovery...the man known as "Bobo" actually lives in bowels of the abandoned park. The kids are abducted and killed one-by-one after being subjected to a bizarre and grisly ritual. MEGAN and her boyfriend JUSTIN manage to escape...but only MEGAN survives. After waking up in a mental hospital, Megan tells Psychologist MARISSA JADE her horrific story. The cops search for the five missing kids at the abandoned fun park, but find no bodies or evidence that Megan's story is true. When the psychologist stumbles upon a tiny clue, she begins to investigate further and discovers that Megan's chilling ordeal might have actually happened after ...
movies.simplePlot: Six teens discover that the ghost of "Bobo the Clown" living in an abandoned fun park is more than an urban legend.

biography.bio: Jillian Leigh Murray was born in Reading, Pennsylvania. She has one younger sister named Meghan. She left Reading at 15 and moved to Tucson, Arizona, where she began her professional career with independent films. She completed high school in Tucson and immediately headed to Los Angeles to pursue her acting career. Her credits include roles in An American Carol (2008) alongside Kelsey Grammer and Dennis Hopper and Cougar Hunting (2011) with Lara Flynn Boyle. She has also starred in such horror films as The Graves (2009), erotic thrillers like Wild Things 4 (1994) and the action film Never Back Down 2: The Beatdown (2011) with Michael Jai White.
biography.name: Jillian Murray

biography.bio: Randy Wayne was born on August 7, 1981 in Moore, Oklahoma, USA as Randy Wayne Frederick. He is an actor and producer, known for Honey 2 (2011), Hellraiser: Judgment (2017) and The Dukes of Hazzard: The Beginning (2007).
biography.name: Randy Wayne

biography.bio: Trevor St. John David is an actor and casting director, known for The Worst Year of My Life (2015), Hunky Dory (2016) and Alvin and the Chipmunks (2007).

biography.bio: Jennifer Ferguson was born as Jennifer Lee Ferguson. She is an actress, known for Sam & Janet (2002), Atom Nine Adventures (2007) and Automatic (2005). She has been married to Carmen Vitucci since September 22, 2007.
biography.name: Jennifer Ferguson

biography.bio: Sara Rae Foster is an American stage and screen actress. Most recent work: Tara Thomas on CBS series "Doubt" (2017), starring Katherine Heigl, Elliott Gould, and Laverne Cox and the LA Times Critics' Choice production of Rajiv Joseph's "Gruesome Playground Injuries" at the Hudson Theatre, Hollywood. She can also be seen in Showtime's "Masters of Sex" (as Rae Foster), TNT's event series "Mob City", and national ad campaigns for Honda, Verizon Wireless, and Call of Duty.
biography.name: Sara Rae Foster

biography.bio: Vanessa Lauren Gamble is known for her work on Sam & Janet (2002), Recall (2013) and Wedgerino (2015).
biography.name: Vanessa Lauren Gamble

biography.name: Richard Geren
